Both CP and H‐IG depend on plasma collected from patients who have recovered from the diseases. The US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has provided nonbinding recommendations for CP donation: donors must have had documented infection with SARS‐CoV‐2 (real‐time polymerase chain reaction or serology) and at least 28 days from resolution of symptoms or at least 14 days without symptoms and a negative real‐time polymerase chain reaction test.
